name: End-to-End Lead Management with AI Follow-up and Team Alerts

parameters.formDescription: Please share your details so we can get in touch with you

values.fieldLabel: How did you hear about us?

values.formSubmittedText: Thank you! We will contact you shortly.

assignments.name: error_message
assignments.value: Invalid lead data: Missing or invalid email address

parameters.content:
📋 WORKFLOW OVERVIEW

This workflow automates lead management:
1️⃣ Captures leads via web form
2️⃣ Validates & stores in Google Sheets
3️⃣ Alerts sales team via Telegram
4️⃣ Generates AI-powered follow-up email
5️⃣ Sends personalized email to lead

⚙️ SETUP REQUIRED:
• Google Sheets credentials
• Telegram bot token
• Gmail OAuth2
• OpenAI API key
• Update Workflow Configuration node

📝 FORM TRIGGER

Collects lead information:
• Full Name (required)
• Email Address (required)
• Phone Number (required)
• Source dropdown (required)

🔗 Share the form URL with prospects
✅ Attribution disabled for clean UX

⚙️ CONFIGURATION

🔧 UPDATE THESE VALUES:
• telegram_chat_id: Your Telegram chat ID
• sales_team_name: Your team name
• company_name: Your company name

These values are used throughout the workflow

✅ VALIDATION

Checks lead data quality:
• Email is not empty
• Email contains @ symbol
• Name is not empty

✔️ Valid → Continue to storage
❌ Invalid → Error handler

💾 DATA STORAGE

1️⃣ Structure Lead Data:
   Formats fields + adds timestamp & status

2️⃣ Store in Google Sheets:
   Appends/updates lead in CRM
   Matches by email address

⚠️ UPDATE: Set your Google Sheet ID

📢 SALES ALERT

Sends instant Telegram notification:
• Lead name, email, phone
• Source & timestamp
• Status indicator

⚠️ SETUP: Configure Telegram bot credentials

🤖 AI EMAIL GENERATION

1️⃣ Prepare AI Input:
   Extracts lead data for AI prompt

2️⃣ Generate Email:
   GPT-4o-mini creates personalized email
   • Thanks lead for interest
   • Acknowledges source
   • Clear call-to-action

3️⃣ Structure Parser:
   Formats output (subject, greeting, body)

4️⃣ Send via Gmail:
   Delivers personalized follow-up

⚠️ SETUP: OpenAI + Gmail credentials

⚠️ ERROR HANDLING

Captures invalid leads:
• Missing email
• Invalid email format
• Missing name

Logs error details with timestamp
for troubleshooting

parameters.subject: New Lead

parameters.content: ### Make AI calls to added leads
